task.title: Defining the audio preferences
task.shortdesc: Using the Preferences page, you can define the preferences that servers will use for audio purposes.

taskbody.context: To define these preferences, do the following:

step.cmd: From the Window menu, select Preferences.
In the Preferences window, expand Server and then select Audio.
Specify one or more of the following settings:

chrow.chdesc: Adjusts the volume of the sound played on your computer.
Lists the sounds events to which you can enable the sound. To enable sound for an event, select the check box beside the event.

step.cmd: Click Apply and then OK to save your changes.
